mapper.select: select student.id as id, student.stu_num as num, student.stu_name as name, student.gender as gender, class.cl_name as className, college.col_name as college from tb_student student left join tb_class class on student.class_id = class.id left join tb_college college on class.college_id = college.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT student.stu_num num, student.stu_name name, student.gender gender, re.cl_name className, re.col_name college, re.status FROM tb_student student LEFT JOIN record_detail re on student.stu_num = re.stu_num ${ew.customSqlSegment}
